data.title: Building a more Sustainable and Electrified World
data.meta_description: Our mission is to connect and protect customers with inventive electrical solutions. As the world electrifies around us, we offer solutions for future.
data.text:
FEATURED STORIES

nVent Announces Agreement to Sell Thermal Management Business

The sale is an important step to nVent becoming a higher growth and more focused electrical connection and protection leader, well positioned with the megatrends of electrification, sustainability and digitalization.

nVent Completes Acquisition of Trachte

nVent today announced that it has completed the previously announced acquisition of the parent of Trachte, LLC, a leading manufacturer of custom-engineered control building solutions designed to protect critical electrical infrastructure assets.

nVent Earns Third Consecutive Great Place To Work® Certification™

We are proud to announce nVent has earned a Great Place To Work® Certification™ for the third consecutive year! The certification recognizes employers who create an outstanding employee experience.

nVent Joins Minnesota Lynx Changemakers as Inaugural Partner

Changemakers is a first-of-its-kind venture focused on building the next generation of female leaders and elevating women’s sports in Minnesota.

NEWS AND INSIGHTS →

industry solutions

VIEW ALL →

FEATURED PRODUCTS

RackChiller CDU800 Coolant Distribution Unit

Our RackChiller CDU800 is designed to reliably and efficiently cool IT equipment and support availability and serviceability for next-generation direct-to-chip liquid cooling.

Self-Regulating Heating Technology

Our self-regulating heating cables offer energy efficient and long-lasting freeze protection, process temperature maintenance, snow melt and hot water heating

nVent Intelligent Power Distribution Units

nVent intelligent power distribution units drive smart power use in a variety of data applications and can be used in cabinets, open frame racks and wall-mount enclosures.

FleXbus Connection Solution

Our innovative, patented power connection solution adds energy efficiency, safety and customer productivity to critical systems in energy storage, renewables and more.

INSIGHTS

ARTICLE

Reduce Footprint in Energy Storage Systems

Learn more

Prepare for Explosive AI Growth

AI applications require a massive amount of data processing, which requires high-performance chips on the cutting edge of IT development.

Scalability in Modern Data Center Infrastructure

nVent solutions support data center managers design for modularity, allowing them to scale operations as demand increases

Modernizing Power Management for Data Centers

Global demand for data is increasing. Artificial intelligence, machine learning, the proliferation of cloud and high-performance computing and digitalization trends are driving the need for more data centers, IT infrastructure and communications technology.

Protecting Wind Turbines with Customized Lightning Protection Solutions

As the world becomes more sustainable and electrified, demand for renewable energy is growing. Across Europe, 17% of people rely on wind energy for electricity. Because it plays such a critical role in power infrastructure, protecting wind turbines from harm is critical.

Who We Are

About nVent

We connect and protect with inventive electrical solutions. We design, manufacture, market, install and service high-performance products and solutions that help build a more sustainable and electrified world.

ESG

ESG has been a critical part of who we are and how we have operated since the beginning of our company. At nVent, we focus our ESG efforts in three areas: People, Products and Planet.

Inclusion and Diversity

We celebrate and encourage authenticity at nVent. We strive to create and sustain an inclusive and diverse work environment that drives innovation, connection and growth for our employees and everyone we work with.

Culture

We empower employees to be bold, creative thinkers, which drives engagement and high performance. Our culture has earned a number of awards.

Bring bold ideas. Be authentic.

Careers at nVent

Bring bold ideas. Be authentic. Build the future of a more sustainable and electrified world.

JOIN THE TEAM
